name: mgk.js
description: epik framework for creating simple 2d games with web technologies, this package is new so 100% there might be bugs(entire package not working could also be the case) PLUSS this is open-source (can access it via github: https://github.com/helloworld190/MGK.js), and its fairly easy to pick up since its built on top of canvas2d.
